meanings.definition: A loud, sudden, and sharp noise.
meanings.sent1: The banging of the door startled me.
meanings.sent2: I heard a loud banging coming from the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The banging of the pots and pans in the kitchen made a musical rhythm.
meanings.sent4: The banging of the drums echoed through the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The banging of the hammer against the nail was deafening.

meanings.sent1: She wore a banging dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display was absolutely banging!
meanings.sent3: The banging fireworks lit up the night sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: His banging dance moves stole the show.
meanings.sent5: The banging performance left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: Moving with a series of loud, sharp noises.
meanings.sent1: The banging door kept me up all night.
meanings.sent2: The old car made a banging sound as it drove down the street.
meanings.sent3: The banging sound of the train passing by was like a symphony.
meanings.sent4: The banging footsteps approached closer and closer.
meanings.sent5: The banging wind chimes created a melodious cacophony.
